node.html:
I'm an India based SDE-Test with a goal-driven creative mindset and passion for learning and innovating.

Currently working as a Senior QA Engineer at Forge.

Hello! I am a Software Development Engineer in Test (SDET) with 5+ years of experience in all layers of quality engineering with strong automation as well as functional testing knowledge.

Here is a list of the technologies that I'm familiar with!

• Delivered scalable automation and high-confidence releases across Web3, blockchain wallets, NFTs, and gaming quest systems through deep API, UI, and E2E testing.

  • Created 300+ API automation scripts for enterprise and partner integrations.

  • Raised 70+ high-priority defects and validated 120+ bugs and tasks, ensuring stable Forge Launch and production releases.

  • Led Visual Testing POC, migrating from Mocha to Playwright-BDD (Cucumber) for scalable UI and API automation.

  • Performed wallet, blockchain, API, and UI validation across on-chain and off-chain data flows.

  • Rapidly ramped up on complex systems and performed database-level validations, reducing dependency on developers and improving test accuracy.

  • Collaborated closely with product, blockchain, and backend teams to validate smart contracts, wallets, APIs, and UI workflows.

  • Played a key role in product releases, use-case design, and automation strategy.

  • Produced clear, reproducible defect reports and proactively cleared the Ready-for-QA backlog to keep releases on track.

• Automated critical corporate workflows using Java, Selenium, and BDD Cucumber, improving regression coverage and release confidence.

  • Designed and maintained test plans, test cases, and automation scripts for UAT, functional, and regression testing.

  • Developed and executed web UI automation using Selenium and mobile automation using Appium.

  • Built automation to dynamically fetch the latest APK from BrowserStack and trigger automated test execution, reducing manual setup effort.

  • Integrated automation pipelines with Jenkins and GitHub, enabling continuous testing in CI/CD workflows.

  • Implemented API automation using REST Assured and Postman to validate backend services and data integrity.

  • Created Postman scripts to validate images and product availability across multiple pincodes, ensuring functional accuracy at scale.

  • Collaborated closely with developers and designers to resolve requirement gaps, design issues, and functional defects early in the SDLC.

  • Led and mentored QA engineers, guiding execution and analysis of automation smoke and regression test suites.

  • Received STAR OF THE MONTH Award View CERTIFICATE

Key Achievement: Expanded test coverage by adding automation test cases for 200+ corporate clients in the web application.

• Analyzed business requirements and functional specifications to define a comprehensive test strategy, including test environments, testing phases, and entry/exit criteria.

  • Identified and documented test requirements, including test data and environment needs, aligned with application functionality.

  • Designed and executed test cases based on design documents and acceptance criteria.

  • Performed Functional, Regression, and End-to-End (E2E) testing for new releases of a workplace management application.

  • Conducted extensive cross-browser and cross-platform testing across Chrome, Firefox, Edge, and mobile browsers (Chrome, Safari) to ensure consistent user experience.

  • Authored detailed Test Plans outlining testing objectives, scenarios, phases, and environments following thorough business rule analysis.

  • Proactively drove the resolution of high-priority defects, collaborating closely with development teams to ensure smooth test execution and timely releases.

• Improved Alexa response delivery quality by validating data accuracy and interacting with Alexa applications and devices.

  • Verified high-priority deliverables, ensuring compliance with quality standards and timelines.

  • Mentored and onboarded new team members, supporting role readiness and productivity.

  • Collaborated with ML data scientists and internal stakeholders by providing high-quality datasets to enhance ASR (Automatic Speech Recognition), NLU models, and domain features.

  • Performed Alexa device testing, data creation, curation, and analytical validation to support development, testing, and training of Alexa AI models.

  • Supported English (US) language models through extensive app and device level validation.

  • Received Star Performer Award View CERTIFICATE

Key Achievement: Contributed to process improvements that reduced handling time and improved overall output quality.
A realtime chat app created using Appwrite and ReactJS
A sample application to deploy appwrite blog created with appwrite and React.
Portfolio Website Version 1 hosted using GitHub Pages.
Nike landing page completely built using ReactJS and Tailwind CSS
A Fitness app made with reactjs and material UI.
Modern bank app completely built using ReactJS and Tailwind CSS
A video streaming app made with reactjs and material UI
The application provide features like text conversion from lowercase to uppercase and vice versa. copy all text, clear all text
My inbox is always open. Whether you have a question or just want to say hello, I'll try my best to get back to you! Feel free to mail me about any relevant job updates.
